title: Zelda No Densetsu - Skyward Sword
alternative_title: ゼルダの伝説 スカイウォードソード ; The Legend of Zelda - Skyward Sword ; The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword ; Zelda no Densetsu: Skyward Sword
status: ゼルダの伝説 スカイウォードソード ; The Legend of Zelda - Skyward Sword ; The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword ; Zelda no Densetsu: Skyward Sword
description:
Description :
        Zelda no Densetsu - Skyward Sword is an One-shot based off of the popular Nintendo Wii game of the same name. It's a prequel that tells the sealing of the main villain of the game and Link's Childhood.
